applicationTimeout.label: Application timeout
applicationTimeout.tooltip: The amount of idle time before the Host Client will automatically log out

warning.title: Warning
warning.content: Disabling session time out could leave your ESXi host vulnerable to malicious activity. Are you sure you want to disable session time out?

reset.label: Reset client settings
reset.tooltip: Reset the Host Client's settings to the default values

autorefresh.label: Auto-refresh
autorefresh.tooltip: Tells the Host Client to automatically refresh data from the host at the specified period

upload.inProgress: A file upload is in progress

hypervisorLicense.content: The license assigned to this host restricts operations that may be performed.

restrictedVersion.title: Restricted version
restrictedVersion.content: The assigned license does not allow this operation

dialog.title: Client update available
dialog.content: A new version of the ESXi Host Client is available.

perform.badFormat: Update was not in expected format. Please provide a metadata.zip bundle or VIB

vumWarning.title: Warning
vumWarning.content: If this host is being managed by VMware Update Manager, performing an update may cause the host to become non-compliant. Continue?

dialog.title: Install update
dialog.content: Enter the URL of the VIB or metadata.zip below
dialog.missingVIBURL: Please enter the URL to the VIB or metadata.zip you wish to update
dialog.missingProxy: Please enter the proxy server address

dialog.title: Help us improve the VMware Host Client
dialog.content: VMware’s Customer Experience Improvement Program (“CEIP”) provides VMware with information that enables VMware to improve its products and services and to fix problems. By choosing to participate in CEIP, you agree that VMware may collect technical information about your use of VMware products and services on a regular basis. This information does not personally identify you. For more details about the Program, please see the VMware Host Client documentation.

dialog.title: Reset settings
dialog.content: All application settings will now be reset to the factory defaults. This operation cannot be reversed. When the reset is complete the application will reload.
